original_text: So Aaron did that. He put its lamps at the front of the lampstand, as the Lord had said to Moses.
korean_text: 아론이 그리하여 등불을 등잔대 앞으로 비추도록 켰으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하심과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: He put its lamps at the front of the lampstand,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 등불들을 등대 앞에 놓았습니다,

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had said to Moses.
